Class com.google.common.util.concurrent.SimpleTimeLimiter

Changed Constructors
SimpleTimeLimiter(ExecutorService) Now deprecated.
 Use {@link #create(ExecutorService)} instead.
SimpleTimeLimiter(void) Now deprecated.
 Use {@link #create(ExecutorService)} instead with {@code Executors.newCachedThreadPool()}.
